alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Oakland; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:43AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oakland, southeastern Livingston and northeastern Washtenaw Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 942 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pinckney, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brighton around 950 AM EDT. Hamburg around 955 AM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 1000 AM EDT. South Lyon around 1005 AM EDT. Salem and Dixboro around 1015 AM EDT. Canton around 1030 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hudson Mills, Lakeland, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Chilson, New Hudson, Pinckney State Recreation Area, Hell, Barton Hills and Wixom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
